short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate a guided experience on any platform (OKTA Embedded 3rd Party or Your Flex Custom App)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ziplyne's Player is here to assist you while executing any business process on the software you are using within Flex. This technology will be there to help onboard, train and support you while making the end-user experience even easier ontop of the software you are using. 

(OKTA SS0-Embedded Version)
